page.title: 10CARNIVALS
page.content: Ottery St Mary carnival is held on November 5th. Early in the morning canons wake the people of the town with their loud bangs. At 4 o'clock in the afternoon the boys tar barrels begin. Small lighted tar barrels are carried through the streets by boys aged 8_17 years. There are five barrels which increase in size. The first is in Mill Street,followed by barrels outside the Institute in Yonder Street, The Plume of Feathers, The Kings Arms and lastly Broad Street. At 7pm the Carnival procession begins. There are two sections, walking fancy dress and floats entered by local organizations and householders. Floats from other towns also compete for prizes in the
